data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Omelko, Mikhail M. (2015): Redescription of " Amaurobius " rufipes Taczanowski, 1874 (Araneae: Corinnidae) with notes of Amaurobius species described from French Guyana. Zootaxa 3974 (1): 148-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.1.14
